entry.title: Combined summary - Lightning-dev down
entry.summary: The Lightning-dev mailing list recently experienced downtime resulting in undeliverable messages. ZmnSCPxj sent a test email to check if the issue persisted and discovered that the mailing lists were undergoing a migration process to a new server. The exact duration of the downtime is unknown, but it occurred between 100 to 200 blocks ago. More information regarding the migration process is expected to be released soon. In the meantime, Bryan has provided his contact details for any further inquiries.
